review: Great easy to set up and operate. Lot for choices for shows
author: Greg E.

review: It makes it so easy to put a TV  where ever you want without have to run cable. Works fantastic.
author: Keith D. Weiss

review: How on earth was this back ordered for like 6 wks!!?  Ridiculous!
author: Danielle

review: So far so good. The stick has a slight delay but not when watching a movie and the HD picture is very good.The remote is easy to us
author: Ron

review: Very happy with this product! Works perfectly and is cheaper than Apple TV.
author: Dawn Vilbig "rdawnv7"

review: Fire TV stick works fine. It's easy to setup. The reason I'm giving 3 stars is the delivery time. Prime members supposed to receive items in two days. I ordered it on Feb. 17th and got the stick on Feb 24th. It couldn't be the back order because it showed two days delivery before ordering. An explanation is needed.
author: Book reader

review: Does everything I need it to do!
author: Keith Menchaca

review: Simple to set up and easy to use! I added Huluplus and still saving lots over my cable bill. Good job Amazon!
author: Robert Alexander
